activities: We offer a social wellness platform. The application is licensed by an employer who grants access to employees to track their activity information and progress toward goals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clients provide ShapeUp, Inc. with their employees (participant) personal information in order to facilitate eligibility to register for the service. Participants may add additional personal information to their participation in various programs (challenges). Tracking information relating to challenges are also stored. Clients may request reports on metrics regarding the level of participation.
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using The American Arbitration Association as a third party resolution provider.
